review:
I am 32 years old.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and we adopted our son together. Both are now 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I felt lost and unhappy. I was self-destructive. One day, I was so angry with everything spiraling out of control that I punched a concrete wall in a moment of overwhelming emotion. This resulted in breaking my fifth metacarpal in my right hand—the hand I worked with, played games with, and used to carry my children to bed—the hand I desperately needed to ensure I could continue providing.

Upon learning the severity of the self-inflicted damage, I became almost suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man, with no history of depression or anxiety. I had never experienced anger outbursts, nor was I the type to break down and cry, but I was in a tough situation that truly prevented me from seeing the light on the other side.

With nothing better to do, I looked for a game I could play WITH ONE HAND while recovering. Somehow, I stumbled upon this game and read some of the comments. I decided it was worth a try... I must admit I didn't beat the game, nor did I play as much as some of you. In fact, I may have played this game for only a day or two. That being said, after doing so, I had a new joy and hope for life. I managed to leave behind the pain and suffering that had been thrust upon me. I could experience the joy and happiness of other people. I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ minutes listening to this music, long enough to realize that I would be okay.

After realizing this, I turned off the game and went back to work. My hand hurt a lot, but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so sorry for myself and became the father I needed to be at that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving like.

Today, I am close friends with the mother of my children. We don't fight, argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents and friends.

Now I have 3 children. My third child is, wait, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my separation, and we just unexpectedly stumbled into each other's lives. We have been dating for a year and are very happy together.

Moral of the story: you never know what life has in store for you, and if I had given up when all odds were against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you.

review:
首先从游戏的剧情设计来看剧情过于简单且乏味。故事背景设定在校园内，玩家需要寻找三枚硬币以解开某种谜团。然而整个剧情线索单薄，缺乏深度和吸引力，使得玩家在游戏过程中难以产生强烈的代入感和情感共鸣。

其次游戏的关卡设计也显得相当平淡。每个关卡的任务目标基本相同，都是寻找隐藏的硬币并解开谜题。然而这些谜题设计缺乏创意和挑战性，玩家很快就能摸清规律并轻松完成。这种缺乏挑战性的关卡设计，使得游戏过程变得单调而乏味。

在画面和音效方面同样令人失望。游戏的画面风格过于简单，缺乏细节和层次感，使得游戏世界显得单调而乏味。音效方面，游戏的背景音乐和音效也显得单调且缺乏特色，无法为玩家带来沉浸式的游戏体验。

此外游戏的操作体验也存在问题。游戏的操作方式不够流畅，响应速度较慢，这在一定程度上影响了玩家的游戏体验。尤其是在寻找硬币和解谜的过程中，由于操作的不顺畅，玩家可能会感到焦虑和沮丧。

最后从游戏的整体表现来看缺乏足够的创新和特色。与市面上其他同类型的冒险游戏相比，它并没有明显的优势或亮点，使得它在竞争激烈的市场中难以脱颖而出。

综上所述，在剧情设计、关卡设计、画面音效以及操作体验等方面都存在较大的问题，使得游戏整体表现乏善可陈。如果你正在寻找一款具有深度和吸引力的校园冒险游戏，那么这款游戏可能不是你的最佳选择。建议开发者在未来的版本中，对游戏进行更深入的开发和优化，以提升玩家的游戏体验。

author: {'steamid': '76561198112866114', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 330, 'playtime_forever': 46, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1516771189}
review:
'An overpriced TAFE project!!!'

3 Coins at school is all about the real table game known as penny/coin soccer. The goal is to within 8 shots keep shooting 1 of 3 coins between the other two until you get close enough to shoot one of the coins through your opponents goals. It's a simple time waster that some play at school or at parties among friends.

In this PC version you can only choose 2 out of the three coins to shoot the goal, which severely limits your possibilities and there are no novel variations to the game which many have introduced. For instance some place paper cups or items on the table as defenders and you have to avoid them too. In this game it is the bare essentials in everything. Nothing outstanding which will really captivate your attention and so after you have passed the game within 5 minutes you will be done with it, if not sooner.

The game would have been much better if you were to challenge each kid within the class to a game of coin soccer culminating with an ultimate showdown against clever AI as you take on the teacher, but alas nothing like this is introduced. There is no skill building, no customisation, and no Easter eggs. It's rather boring.

While this developer http://www.89amstudio.com/ is more into web design and showcasing other learned skills, I can't help but ponder that projects like this MUST surely concern potential customers about his general business practices. Unreasonably OVER PRICED, practically zero in customer feedback in the forums, unconcerned with customers getting GOOD value for money in regards to entertainment, must surely hit those alarm bells as to his general work ethics.

In all honesty I probably spent more time and effort in writing this review than he did in game design. Enough said.

While I applaud that he was able to come up with a unique idea, its genuinely humdrum in its implementation. Instead of buying the game, try the game for yourself against a mate in real life. You will have much more fun. Yes save your three coins for another Steam game.

review:
We most likely have all played this game in our pasts on school.
3 Coins At School is a game where you have to shoot coins into the other player's goal.
A simple but entertaining game.

The game works fine, better than expected.
For my feeling it's a bit too slow. 
Those pop-ups annoyed me after a while.

There are 3 difficulty settings to play against the computer.
On all 3 settings it's not that hard to win.
The game is also multi-player but sadly I haven't found anyone that was willing to play this game with me.

The school is in the middle of nowhere, in a place that doesn't make any sense.
A setting with an ocean, mountains & the beach. So random!
The graphics aren't that great, the textures look outdated.

The game is fun for a few minutes but you will get bored quickly.
Personally I just didn't really enjoy it and therefor I can't recommend this game.
4,99€ is also extremely overpriced!

review:
学校の机でコインを３つ使って遊んだことがあるでしょうか。
私は無いんですが、海外の学校ではサッカーのゴールポストとゴールキーパーを取り入れた遊びがあるようです。

まず守備側が両手の拳を、甲を上にして合わせます。両小指を立てて机の上に置き、中の３本の指の第１関節を机の側面に押し当てます。この時の小指がゴールポストになります。
そして最後に左右どちらかの人差し指をひとつだけ机の上に置き、これをゴールキーパーとして使います。小指は動かしませんが、人差し指は自由に動かします。

攻撃側は最初にコイン３つを三角形で接するように机の上に置きます。キックオフ時に一つを指ではじき、３つをバラけさせます。その後は、はじく１つを決め、残りの２つの間を通り抜けることを条件に何度か移動させていきます。この時コインが当たってしまうと反則になり強制的にターンエンドです。そして最終的にゴールを狙えそうになったら直接打ってしまって構いません。日本のおはじきにも似たようなルールがあった気がしますね。

難易度は３つありますが難しいやつは結構難しいです。オンラインマルチもありますが、こんなゲーム、遊びがない学校ぐらいでしか遊んでくれる人いないでしょうね。

author: {'steamid': '76561198062232099', 'num_games_owned': 5821, 'num_reviews': 291, 'playtime_forever': 8322, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8322, 'last_played': 1462308464}
review:
Who didn’t play games similar to 3 Coins at School when you were going to school? I know I did and there were plenty of different variances of those types of games that my peers and I loved to play. Therefore when I saw that the game was released onto Steam I was immediately interested in seeing if I could rekindle some of my favorite school year memories. I wasn’t expecting anything but that opportunity.

Let’s get the technical issues out of the way first before I can get to the meat and potatoes point of my review. The game works as intended. The graphics aren’t pretty and I would have liked to see them improved upon but if they are nothing else they are serviceable. The game play mechanics work though I would have liked a better tutorial than just rules so that players could learn the game a little faster – though it has to be said that it is simple. I found it impossible to find a multiplayer game which isn’t surprising and there is no local multiplayer option. But why would you really need a local option because if you wanted to play all you’d need to do is get a few coins.

So my problem with the game…. Playing against the computer opponent is a relatively boring experience. It’s a time waster and not in a good way. It’s impossible to rekindle the memories of playing these types of games with friends at school because when all is said and done you’re not necessarily playing because you love the game, you’re playing because you love spending time with friends. You’re playing to spend the six to eight hours a day that you need to be at school in the most social ways possible. You probably even played these types of games because you were bored and you played mind numbing games to get those hours done with.

A game like this without playing with active people who you can laugh and talk with just isn’t a fulfilling experience. That is no disrespect to the devs at 89AM Studio and I appreciate their efforts in trying but ultimately they developed a sadly unnecessary game.

I would really not like to shit on games because I know developers took time and energy to make them, but this game is complete trash. The concept of this game might be something fun you can play in real life, but the way this game makes it is just so bad I can't even... All of my additional hours are just to get the steam trading card drops so don't be mislead.

To start, the only thing you can do in this game is play their idea. There's nothing else and multiplayer is 100% dead. The gameplay is also both very edgy and not fine tuned at all. There is no direction arrow, there is no option to lower speed, the AI looks like they just generated a random 3D model, when a goal is blocked, there are the most unnatural physics, and your "middle" finger bends like the most unnatural thing ever. Nothing about the gameplay is fine tuned. Remember that this game costs fucking FIVE DOLLARS at full price. I have no clue what this developer is thinking because this game is worth 20 cents the most.

The only good thing I can think to say about this game is that it has a nice menu soundtrack, although it gets repetitive pretty fast. Also like I said before, the game's concept could be something you can play in real life, although I probably wouldn't be playing it anymore.

Overall, shitty game presented at a real high price. I would not recommend this game to anyone because there is no fun playing it at all.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028570547', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2563, 'playtime_forever': 565, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 565, 'last_played': 1464383682}
review:
"3 Coins at School" ist ein Pinning- oder Münzenschnipp-Simulator.

Schonmal Respekt an den Leser, der noch nicht weggeklickt hat.

Worum gehts? Zwei Menschen sitzen an einem Tisch. Einer bildet mit seinen Händen ein Tor, die kleinen Finger sind die Pfosten und ein Zeigefinger repräsentiert den Torwart. Der andere hat drei Münzen, von denen er nach bestimmten Regeln versucht eine ins Tor zu bringen. Es wird abwechselnd gespielt, wer fünf Tore hat, hat gewonnen. Das wars, mehr ist nicht. Das ist das ganze Spiel. Achja, drei Schwierigkeitsgrade gibts noch und einen Multiplayer.

Grafisch ist man zunächst beeindruckt von dem wogenden Meer, den Wassermassen, den Lichtreflexen... was das mit Münzenschnipsen zu tun hat? Gar nichts. Sobald wir am Tisch sitzen wird die Grafik denn auch grauenhaft unansehnlich. Standard-Bildschirmauflösungen fehlen, Texturen sind schwammig und die Physik ist sehr rudimentär. Der Sound geht einem spätestens nach fünf Minuten auf den Wecker, welch Glück, daß man das Game sowieso nicht länger als fünf Minuten spielen will.

[h1]3 Coins at School－那些年幹過的蠢事[/h1]
[url=https://www.keylol.com/article/SING9/9]Keylol評測[/url]

[h1]前言[/h1]
我完全能理解為什麼3 Coins at School遊戲地點設定為學校，若果是發生在學校，出現任何無聊又幼稚的遊戲也不覺得驚訝。
[spoiler]畢竟回想起當年在學校無聊透頂時幹過的蠢事…彈橡皮擦（還要加上釘書釘來滑得更溜）、天上天下、原子筆足球也不是沒玩過（爆[/spoiler]

[h1]遊戲規則[/h1]
硬幣總共有3個，首次射擊必須像桌球一樣"開球"打散兩金幣。
接下來的彈擊均不可以碰觸到任一硬幣，並且必須穿插於其餘兩個硬幣之間，否則本回合結束輪到對方進攻。
用力過大導致硬幣掉落桌面出界，同樣進攻權會被傳遞到對方手上。

不可超越紅線射門，不然無效[spoiler]（嗯？有沒有叫同桌不可越界的即視感www[/spoiler]

每一回合限時60秒，移動上限是8次。將硬幣射進對方"球門"得1分，當一名玩家率先達到5分為之勝出。

[h1]遊戲操作[/h1]
瞄準－左右移動鼠標
長按左鍵－蓄力釋放左鍵－發射
變換目前硬幣（開球後解鎖）－右鍵
調整鏡頭－前後移動鼠標
聊天－Enter回車

[h1]優點[/h1]
[list]
[*]支持單人與多人模式
       單人模式可選3款難易度，多人模式可加入當前空房或自建房間
[*]操作簡單
       上面已介紹的操作方式簡單，上手容易無難度。
[*]校園生活情懷
       懷念一下[strike]中二病時期[/strike]往時與同學瘋玩小遊戲的時光
[/list]

[h1]缺點[/h1]
[list]
[*][strike]間中有bug[/strike]
       [strike]進球時不時卡bug，人物會全身顫抖[/strike] 更新0.19補丁已修正
[*]定價過高不值
       國區價格21塊，同樣價位可以買到更加好的遊戲。
[/list]

吐槽一下預告片用了整整一分鐘看風景，實際上遊戲內僅僅是主選單的背景，而且只是一個畫面不斷重覆的，還被主選單資料擋住。完全不明白介紹視頻為何花一半時間在此，更別說放在影片開頭部份。

總結：無聊打發時間用，價位不值，免費領或進包可考慮下。
